JOBS-DESCRIPTION: At Blanko, I worked as a Full Stack developer, building from scratch a platform for selling pre-fabricated advertisements using famous people images. At Evoy, I worked on an IoT device platform, managing more than 10 thousand devices and their assets, I had multiple responsibilities, from maintaining the infrastructure in Aws, to building new features in React and Node.

ABOUT-SECTION.TITLE:
Hello! I`m Ed Angelis R Ribeiro Brazilian, 12/23/1984 
Welcome to my portfolio

DESCRIPTION.P1: I have always been passionate about technology, I was introduced to development after joining the Information Systems course in 08/2017, since then I have been programming and studying practically every day of my life, and smiling I will continue doing this for the rest of it.
DESCRIPTION.P2: Very curious, I've created games in Unity, Apps in Flutter, I've even spent a few months focusing on machine learning, but my focus is JavaScript frameworks for Web and Mobile development with React, React-Native and Node js.
DESCRIPTION.P3: When I'm not coding, studying or exercising, I enjoy some very diverse activities, such as scuba diving, playing poker, playing beach-tennis, an interesting fact about me is that at some point in my life I have already worded as a professional poker player. and at another time as a diving instructor. In addition to these activities, I like the basics, listening to music, watching movies, playing games, reading something to relax before bed.
DESCRIPTION.P4: I see myself in 10 years, working on some project with a global impact with millions of users, always coding, but leading a development team, beyond work I see myself taking care of a garden, some cats, and watching my children grow up healthy.
